definition: ready and able to resort to force or violence
details:
adjective
- ready and able to resort to force or violence
= example: ready and able to resort to force or violence
= synonyms: rough
- tough and callous by virtue of experience
= example: tough and callous by virtue of experience
= synonyms: hard-boiled, hard-bitten
- naturally aggressive, hostile or combative
= example: naturally aggressive, hostile or combative
